channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New law in Iowa allows 14-year-olds get a driver’s license
item.description: Minors allowed to ferry themselves to work and school.

item.title: Markets will be 'upset' if new French government doesn't commit to fiscal rules, ECB VP says
item.description: "What we have seen so far is that the evolution of [French] markets has been quite orderly," the vice president of the European Central Bank told CNBC.

item.title: Top banks have raced to up dividends after Fed stress tests — here’s how much
Planning decision for London’s controversial ‘Undershaft’ skyscraper delayed as objections mount over the city’s tallest tower
item.description: The chairman of Lloyd's of London complained the skyscraper would rob London of an important public square.

item.title: Media mogul Barry Diller weighs a bid to gain control of Paramount
item.description: Barry Diller's IAC is weighing an offer for Shari Redstone's National Amusements Inc., which would give the media mogul control of Paramount.

item.title: Hedge-fund billionaire Dalio now fears November clash between political extremes
Wingstop’s U.K. sober millennial chief walks to work from his Hampstead Heath apartment and has $25 lunches from London’s hottest luxury gym
item.description: Tom Grogan tells Fortune how he lives his “Good Life” from what he spends his bonus money on to his go-to $25 lunch order.

item.title: Goldman's favorite stocks for the second half — including 3 additions to its conviction list
item.description: The firm added some new names as the second half of the year kicks into gear.

item.title: U.S. stocks on track to kick off year’s third quarter with gains — live coverage
8 best secured credit cards to help build or repair your credit
item.description: We compared dozens of secured credit cards across numerous financial institutions and weighed minimum account deposits, annual fees, credit limits, rewards, and more.

item.title: Trump hush money prosecutors won't oppose sentencing delay while ex-president fights verdict
item.description: Manhattan prosecutors do not oppose a bid by Donald Trump to postpone being sentenced in his criminal hush money case while he seeks to overturn his conviction.

item.title: BlackRock agrees to acquire privately held U.K.-based Preqin for $3.2 billion
Ken Griffin is hitting pause on the AI hype, saying he’s unconvinced the tech will start replacing jobs in the next 3 years
item.description: “For a number of reasons, I am not convinced that these models will achieve that type of breakthrough in the near future.”

item.title: GM reports best U.S. quarterly sales since 2020
item.description: EVs deliveries increased 40% compared to a year earlier to 21,930 units. Still, EVs made up only 3.2% of GM's total second quarter sales.

item.title: French stocks surge by most in nearly two years after first round of election
